features: 10x more durable than traditional nonstick: duration nonstick soleplate glides smoothly over clothes.
33% more steam: This steam iron for clothes offers superior wrinkle removal from even the most stubborn of fabrics.
Neat, easy storage: 8 foot cord wrap conveniently wraps around the base for neat, easy storage.
Doubles as a Vertical steamer: the steam iron function lets you steam wrinkles from clothes while they’re still on the hanger.

3-Way auto shutoff: have peace of mind knowing the clothing iron will automatically power off after 30 seconds when placed on its soleplate or side and after 15 minutes when propped upright on its heel.
100% quality tested: all Hamilton Beach irons are pre-tested at the Factory to ensure excellent quality when it arrives to your home. Condensation may be visible in the steam chamber from this test.

Handles the toughest ironing jobs: It comes fully featured with anti-drip technology, spray, Blast, adjustable steam, vertical steam, auto shut-off, self clean, duration nonstick, cord wrap plus 1500W to handle every tough ironing Job.
Large dial and Comfort handle. Adjusting temperatures and maneuvering the iron is easy thanks to a large dial, textured grip and stable heel rest.
body.description: Hamilton Beach Durathon soleplate iron with cord wrap. Durathon is a finish 10x more durable than stainless steel, ceramic and traditional non-stick. Durathon is an aluminum coated soleplate coated with two layers of ceramic and then a nonstick top coat.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Durathon irons offer you more continuous steam* for superior wrinkle removal as well as superior glide performance.

Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach Steam Iron & Vertical Steamer for Clothes with Scratch-Resistant Durathon Soleplate With incomparable steam output and a nonstick soleplate that is ten times more durable than traditional nonstick, you can’t go wrong with a Durathon iron at your side. It simply outperforms and outlasts most irons on the market—period. With exceptional iron features like these, you might imagine finishing all your ironing projects with superhuman speed. You’ll certainly have the stamina to stick with them ten times longer. Scratch-resistant durability Superior glide performance Pull-out cord wrap 3-way auto shutoff 1500 Watts

10x more durable than traditional nonstick: Duration nonstick soleplate glides smoothly over clothes. 33% more steam*: This steam iron for clothes offers superior wrinkle removal from even the most stubborn of fabrics. *Compared to Hamilton Beach 14289 Doubles as a Vertical steamer: The steam iron function lets you steam wrinkles from clothes while they’re still on the hanger. Neat, easy storage: 8 foot cord wrap conveniently wraps around the base for neat, easy storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Temp, and cooling
reviews.reviewText: Great product, heat and temperature control works. Takes no time to cooldown.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great product
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this unit based on many of the reviews. It lives up to the quality recommendations. No buildup on the iron - great product for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Poor Instructions but iron works great
reviews.reviewText: I really like this iron. It heats up fast and works great, even on very wrinkled 100% cotton materials. The steam function works great, and I love the burst of steam and spray options. It's easy to use & has a nice balance to it. I just have a few minor complaints which are not a deal breaker. 1) The instructions do not tell me how to use the Self Clean function. 2) Instructions do not tell me the 3 positions in which the iron will automatically turn off. 3) I am unable to pull out the end for the cord storage. My model is not the retractable cord model, but it IS the model that has the cord storage, and I can't get it open, and neither can my husband. 4) The water tank cover won't close unless you push really, really hard.12-15-22 Update: I contacted the manufacturer and they were able to provide me with instructions for issues 1 & 2 above. For #3, you just have to grab and wiggle the cord storage section, while pulling really hard. Then it will come open. For #4, you just have to push really hard to get the cover to close. See below for instructions regarding #1 and 2 ....... ( I am also changing the rating to 4 stars)IHere are instructions in email from the manufacturer that are not included in the instruction pamphlet in the box:Below are instructions for cleaning your sole plate and use of the self-clean feature.To clean the sole plate, use the steam function on an old cotton towel. Fill the unit with water, allow the unit to heat on the cotton setting for 2 minutes the use the steam feature while ironing on the cotton towel. This will help remove any build up that may be on the sole plate.If you have not done so, we recommend cleaning the inside of your iron as well.We have provided the self-clean steps below:1.Turn Temperature Control Dial to OFF (O) and set Adjustable Steam Switch to Dry Iron. Fill iron with water to 1/2 of its maximum capacity.2. Turn Temperature Control Dial to Linen setting and let iron heat for 2 minutes. Keep Adjustable Steam Switch on Dry Iron.3. Turn Temperature Control Dial to OFF (O). Unplug iron and hold over a sink with sole plate facing down.4. Turn Adjustable Steam Switch to MAX, while pressing Self-Clean/Blast Button often. Boiling water and steam will flow out of steam vents. Allow all water to drain from iron.5. Gently move iron front to back to allow water to clean entire sole plate area.6. If water still remains inside of sole plate, reheat iron as indicated in Step 2. Boiling water and steam could still flow out of steam vents.Remember to empty all the water after each use. If the water is not emptied, it may interact with the metal of the iron and cause the water to discolor. This will result in steam and water droplets discoloring clothing.Also, this model is equipped with the 3-way auto shutoff. Here are the ways the appliance will auto shutoff:a) Shut off mode should occur within 30 +/-5 seconds if the iron is left motionless while resting on the soleplate.b) Shut off mode should occur within 15+/- minutes if the iron is left motionless while resting on its heel.c) While resting on its side, shut off mode may occur either within 30 +/-5 seconds, or within 15 +/-2 minutes if the iron is left motionless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get the job done

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but smells
reviews.reviewText: Not sure why this keeps happening, but this iron smells strongly when you turn it on. If you are sensitive to odors, note that this iron does consistently reek.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This was the iron I was looking for when I tried a number of others. The primary thing I like is the ability to turn the Steam on and off while you are ironing. Some similar irons from other makers require you to either have the tank empty or filled with water to either have Steam or, but with this model you can iron on the go either dry or with steam. That is important to me because I use starch for my shirts and can easily switch back and forth to get the finish that I like. Easy to use and does a a nice job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchase this iron thought I was getting a good product the moment it came out of the box the entire cord was wrap to the side I thought it’s an easy fix and it would retract but I was wrong, I continue to use it cause I had an event I was going to that evening, the iron spewed water all over my gown as I started to iron, it was a nightmare I had to blow dry my gown in order to wear it, BEWARE DO NOT PURCHASE
Esta plancha no le pide nada a otros, buena bonita y a buen precio, despues vi que en otros lado esta a precio mucho menor, pero bueno, ni modo. Me salio buena.
Functional medium sized iron that works well and stores away compactly between uses.
